scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=test && export RUNTIME_ENV=dev && nodemon bin/development.js
scripts.dev:stage: export NODE_ENV=stage && export RUNTIME_ENV=dev && nodemon bin/development.js
scripts.dev:prod: export NODE_ENV=production && export RUNTIME_ENV=dev && nodemon bin/development.js
scripts.prod:test: export NODE_ENV=test && export RUNTIME_ENV=prod && node bin/development.js
scripts.prod:stage: export NODE_ENV=stage && export RUNTIME_ENV=prod && node bin/development.js
scripts.prod: export NODE_ENV=production && export RUNTIME_ENV=prod && node bin/development.js
